thread.title: Convenient location, but terrible facilities
thread.title_full: Convenient location, but terrible facilities - Review of Victoria Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Monika J
title: Convenient location, but terrible facilities
text:
I stayed there before and thought it was ok, but this time (3 years later) it was a disappointment. It seems like despite a polished look in the pictures, the hotel is tired and needs some attention.
To start with, my room had no ventilation - the window didn't open and the bathroom had no extractor, it was difficult to regulate the temperature too. The smell in the room seemed to have been there since months or years back.
The bed frame was unstable and the mattress tilted to the sides (repositioning me with it) every time I moved. The shower door didn't close and the water didn't drain. Thankfully it was clean.
The hotel itself was very noisy, on Sunday night, there was a lot of banging noise from around midnight, it sounded like somebody trying to fix something... Poor acoustics also meant that I heard every word from a room on the other side of the corridor.
Day staff seemed ok, but the night guard was outright rude.
I'm glad the stay didn't cost me much, because it was subsidised with loyalty points, but I would have been upset if I'd paid the full price!
Room Tip: Do not choose the 4th floor rooms See more room tips
